roles.title: investors and private finance
quotes: This includes setting out a robust pathway that clearly defines the role of investors and private finance in general.
Positioning the UK as a global leader in sustainable finance could unlock significant economic and strategic benefits.
Develop collaborative frameworks: between the UK government, institutional investors, and other stakeholders to overcome obstacles and enable the shift of investment towards EMDEs.
With the U.S. backsliding, the UK has a unique opportunity to position itself as the premier destination for green finance and international investment in climate-related projects.
